content.raw:
A better starting viewpoint for the test world:

~~~
diff -r ef08d513dc05 test/worlds/keys_to_joints.world
--- a/test/worlds/keys_to_joints.world	Wed Nov 09 10:33:58 2016 -0800
+++ b/test/worlds/keys_to_joints.world	Wed Nov 09 18:00:50 2016 -0800
@@ -4,6 +4,11 @@
 
     <gui fullscreen='0'>
       <plugin name='keyboard' filename='libKeyboardGUIPlugin.so'/>
+      <camera name='user_camera'>
+        <pose frame=''>4.5 0 11 0.000361 1.57 1.57036</pose>
+        <view_controller>orbit</view_controller>
+        <projection_type>perspective</projection_type>
+      </camera>
     </gui>
 
     <include>
~~~
content.html:
A better starting viewpoint for the test world:

diff -r ef08d513dc05 test/worlds/keys_to_joints.world
--- a/test/worlds/keys_to_joints.world  Wed Nov 09 10:33:58 2016 -0800
+++ b/test/worlds/keys_to_joints.world  Wed Nov 09 18:00:50 2016 -0800
@@ -4,6 +4,11 @@

     <gui fullscreen='0'>
       <plugin name='keyboard' filename='libKeyboardGUIPlugin.so'/>
+      <camera name='user_camera'>
+        <pose frame=''>4.5 0 11 0.000361 1.57 1.57036</pose>
+        <view_controller>orbit</view_controller>
+        <projection_type>perspective</projection_type>
+      </camera>
     </gui>

     <include>
